message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product for $9,500. I think it would be very valuable to you and this is a very competitive price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I believe that's a more reasonable price for the product, considering its value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $8,500 is quite a bit below what I had in mind. How about we meet in the middle at $9,000?
I'm not sure I can go as high as $9,000, but I'm willing to meet you at $8,750. That's the highest I'm willing to go.
